title: Book an ADR Session for an Actor
description: A director has requested an Automated Dialogue Replacement (ADR) session for an actor to re-record some lines of dialogue.

tasks.description: Identify the scenes and lines that need to be re-recorded.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a list of the specific dialogue to be recorded.

tasks.description: Check the actor's availability and the availability of the recording studio.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a time slot that works for both the actor and the studio.

tasks.description: Book the ADR session and send confirmations to the actor and the sound engineer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the studio and sends out calendar invites.
